channel.title: What's with my shops? [PI] Will rep++
channel.description:
Okay so quite a while back my shops started to look like this [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/f58ytk.png[/img]
with that square on the left. I didn't really focus on it much so I just moved along, I thought it was just me that could see it but then some people saw it too. So now I'm worried, how could I fix this? Or what's wrong/am I doing wrong?

item.title: What's with my shops? [PI] Will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Clawd Clawd
item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

Ive never seen anything like that before and im new to this stuff but maybe its the trade image? Check the sprites/gui folder or something

Read full topic
item.source: What's with my shops? [PI] Will rep++

item.title: What's with my shops? [PI] Will rep++

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I had the same problem, but I just added the new shops. They look neater and not as plain.
